short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attachment Metadata Removal for Gmail that cleans metadata from Microsoft Office and Adobe PDF attachments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Okatee cleans sensitive metadata from Gmail attachments.

How it works:
1. Integrates directly into the Gmail compose pane.
2. Select files to clean with the "Clean and Attach" button.

Compatible with:
🧾  .pdf (Core Properties / XMP Metadata / Annotations / Comments)
📝  .docx .doc (Core Properties / Custom Properties / Comments / Tracked Changes)
🗒️  .pptx .ppt (Core Properties / Custom Properties / Comments / Slide Notes)
📊  .xlsx .xls (Core Properties / Custom Properties / Comments)
📷  .png (XMP / Location / EXIF)
📷  .jpg (XMP / Location / EXIF)
📷  .jpeg (XMP / Location / EXIF)

Features:
 📧 Integrates directly into Gmail
 🔒 Secure metadata removal
 📄 Improves compatibility
 🗜️ Reduces file size

Great for:
 👨‍⚖️ Legal professionals
 👨‍💼 Chartered professional accountants
 🕵️‍♀️ Government officials and employees
 👩‍⚕️ Medical professionals (HIPAA compliant)
 👩‍💻 Journalists and their contacts

More information on Okatee can be found here: https://okatee.com/

Okatee is a Metadata Scrubbing Tool for Gmail. Okatee does not store or retain any attachment data. Your data stays secure and confidential.
